alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Franklin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 4:51PM CDT until June 08 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Colbert County in northwestern Alabama... Central Franklin County in northwestern Alabama... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 451 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Belgreen, or 11 miles west of Russellville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Russellville, Phil Campbell, Littleville, Belgreen, Cedar Creek Reservoir, Srygley Church, New Bethel, La Grange, Tharptown and Rockwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
